text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki main tumhen khuda ke nazadeek saza mein isase kaheen badatar aib bata doon (achchha lo suno) jisapar khuda ne laanat kee ho aur us par gazab dhaaya ho aur unamen se kisee ko (masakh karake) bandar aur (kisee ko) sooar bana diya ho aur (khuda ko chhodakar) shaitaan kee parastish kee ho pas ye log daraje mein kaheen badatar aur raahe raast se bhatak ke sabase jyaada door ja pahunche hain
